thread.title: HIGH SCHOOL BASKETBALL: Shen will honor Kevin Huerter with jersey retirement ceremony on Jan. 28
thread.title_full: HIGH SCHOOL BASKETBALL: Shen will honor Kevin Huerter with jersey retirement ceremony on Jan. 28

author: Staff report
title: HIGH SCHOOL BASKETBALL: Shen will honor Kevin Huerter with jersey retirement ceremony on Jan. 28
text:
On Tuesday, January 28, the Shenendehowa Central School District will host the Shaker Blue Bison Basketball teams for a triple-header event.
While both school’s boys and girls varsity teams are currently ranked in the upper echelon for New York State’s Class AAA, the on-court action won’t be the only highlight.
Shenendehowa’s former standout athlete and 2016 graduate, Kevin Huerter, will be in attendance for a jersey retirement ceremony in between the games on Jan. 28, honoring his contribution to the school’s athletics.
Huerter is in his seventh season in the NBA, and third as a member of the Sacramento Kings.
For the evening, there will be one admission price of $4, which will be good for any or all of the three games.
Per Shenendehowa’s press release, this event will have a limited capacity and will likely sell out. GoFan tickets are available at https://gofan.co/event/2299570?schoolId=NY1384.
The boys’ junior varsity game between Shenendehowa and Shaker will tip-off at 4 p.m., followed by the girls’ varsity game at 5:30 p.m. The boys’ varsity matchup is scheduled for 7:15 p.m.
